Package client

Interface GameClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PentagoClient
    public interface GameClient
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Class that represents a game client that is used to communicate with the network server.
    Author:
    Aliaksei Kouzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      Close the connection with the server.
      boolean connect​(java.net.InetAddress address, int port)
      Connect to a network server by its host address and the port.
      Move getMoveHint()
      Return a hint containing the information on how to make a move, along with a random possible move on the board.
      ClientState getState()
      Get the current client state.
      void handleMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Handle a message sent by the server.
      boolean init​(java.lang.String description)
      Initialize the client once the connection with the server has been established.
      void list()
      Request the server to send a list of currently online users.
      boolean login​(java.lang.String username)
      Login to the server.
      void ping()
      Check the connection with the server by sending a ping message.
      void play()
      Join or leave the queue on the server to play a game.
      void play​(Strategy strategy)
      Join or leave the queue on the server to play a game as an AI player using a provided strategy.
      void playMove​(int position, int rotation)
      Decide a move during the game session.
      void sendMessage​(MessageType type, java.lang.String[] args)
      Send a message to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect​(java.net.InetAddress address,
                int port)
        Connect to a network server by its host address and the port.
        Parameters:
        address - server address
        port - server port
        Returns:
        true if successfully connected to the server

      • handleMessage

        void handleMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Handle a message sent by the server.
        Parameters:
        message - server message

      • init

        boolean init​(java.lang.String description)
        Initialize the client once the connection with the server has been established.
        Parameters:
        description - client description
        Returns:
        true if successfully initialized on the server

      • login

        boolean login​(java.lang.String username)
        Login to the server.
        Parameters:
        username - client username
        Returns:
        true if successfully logged in

      • close

        void close()
        Close the connection with the server.

      • list

        void list()
        Request the server to send a list of currently online users.

      • ping

        void ping()
        Check the connection with the server by sending a ping message. The other party must immediately respond with a pong message.

      • play

        void play()
        Join or leave the queue on the server to play a game.

      • play

        void play​(Strategy strategy)
        Join or leave the queue on the server to play a game as an AI player using a provided strategy.
        Parameters:
        strategy - strategy that the future AI player will utilize

      • playMove

        void playMove​(int position,
              int rotation)
       throws InvalidMoveException
        Decide a move during the game session.
        Parameters:
        position - field position
        rotation - subboard position
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the move details are invalid

      • getMoveHint

        Move getMoveHint()
        Return a hint containing the information on how to make a move, along with a random possible move on the board.
        Returns:
        hint on possible moves

        Send a message to the server.
